statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversion = true;
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND conversion = TRUE;
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND page_visited = 'Home Page';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE id = 1 AND visit_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Social Media';
DELETE FROM page_data WHERE total_visits < 10 AND average_visit_duration > INTERVAL '10 minutes';
